content:
Prev: Lindsey at bat Up: Hot Shots vs Ice Breakers Next: Christina and John

The coaches discuss the rules



The issue was that Jennifer had to leave the game due to a twisted ankle. Players who leave the game for personal reasons are given an out at their next at-bat, but everyone eventually agreed that this shouldn't apply because the departure was due to an injury. The point ended up being moot, though, because Jennifer's at-bat didn't come around again before the game ended.

Taken Tuesday, April 06, 2004, 05:44:41pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 6.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/500s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 98mm (157mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5600:5, 0.65:10:50:60:3:25:15+M, Copy, Same w/exp -1.5, Paste, Dark layer channel as selection, Feather, Hide selection, USM 20:20, Crop, Curves 0:0 - 10:11 - 225:235 - 245:250 - 255:255
